summary: netfilter: ctnetlink: fix compilation warning after data race fixes in ct mark
details:
netfilter: ctnetlink: fix compilation warning after data race fixes in ct mark

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.13 by commit 05d052236cfbbb3fba8e2d03af2c534ee6eb8121, it was introduced in version v6.0.11 by commit 3956a1178866bef7755e539d033a32b0035848d6. For more details please see the references link.
